name: betterdiscord
description: Enhances Discord by adding functionality and themes.

scripts.build: pnpm run build-injector && pnpm run build-preload && pnpm run build-renderer
scripts.build-prod: pnpm --filter injector build-prod && pnpm --filter preload build-prod && pnpm --filter renderer build-prod
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js common/ && pnpm --filter injector lint && pnpm --filter preload lint && pnpm --filter renderer lint-js
